transcripts.text: Stay in the house.  excuse me can i help you?  yeah absolutely what can i do for you?
we came up here a couple weeks ago.  there's more than we had out for someone.
yeah that was me.  that's been rescinded.  it has been yeah please keep six feet.  you're not wearing a mask and i've been traveling.  i don't want you to get sick for me.
no you're fine as long as that's been taken care of.  that's all i was worried about.  i just seen you standing out there and i knew that we had came and Fair enough.

Do you just again, I have autism, so I need you to understand.  my communication is not what's the word aggressive or belligerent.  But I've received a lot of harassment from the Alamance County Sheriff's Department and not you personally.  You're the first.  I have an eidetic memory.  I memorize faces.  So you I don't have a problem with.  I got you.  But you do have the ability, yes, to check and see if you have a warrant.  So why would you stop at my... Allow me to speak, sir.  And please do not interrupt me because what happens is if you interrupt me, I lose my train of thought.  And then I'm not able to continue this conversation with you, which I wish to be peaceful.  So how come you don't have the ability to stop, look up the warrant instead of pulling my driveway and come in my driveway?  Because whether you don't intend that to be harassment...

It is.  Yes, this is harassment folks.  This cop hasn't checked the validity of the act of war, yet he's willing to trespass on private property about something he knows nothing about.  And the sad part is a simple Google search could have concluded his investigation.

Because your department has been giving me so much crap and I'm tired of it.  I've had them sent here over false allegations of drugs.  I'm convinced you guys planted it on me, and we're going to trial over it, over that warrant that you guys tried to serve, which got cleared up.  So please answer why you couldn't.  No, no, dude, you could have just pulled up the warrant and looked at it.  You didn't have to pull in my driveway is what I'm trying to tell you.  yeah you saw me standing outside.  i saw you drive by.  my point is there's no need for you to be here and i would i would like you to be on your way.  well absolutely so.  thank you.
we've done got that taken care of and i think that's been served.  that's all i cared about.
yeah next time sir check your computer.  okay there's no need for you to tell me how to do my job.  i will tell you anything i feel like and if you don't like get the off my property now now done.

Wait, you heard him.  What'd he say?  And there you have it, folks.  The IQ of the average cop is very dangerous.  Not only is this one a gentleman, he's a scholar.  Until the next one, much love, blessings, peace, always respect.  You decide.
